text: Testing Management QA – Intern at KAMPUS MERDEKA - BANK CIMB NIAGA, South Tangerang, ID
Developed and managed 30+ test scripts daily using Microsoft Excel and ALM software, achieving 100% compliance with testing standards (SDLC, UAT, Micro Focus ALM, Blackbox, Gherkin).
Executed comprehensive testing processes for mobile and web applications, identifying and reporting 50+ defects to improve application functionality (Defect Management, Report).

Produced detailed testing documentation, contributing to a 9% reduction in bug resolution time through clear communication of test results to development teams (Test Planning, Test Cases, Test Scenarios, Test Execution).
Frontend Developer – Intern at DEDIKASI PEMUDA NEGERI (DPN), South Sulawesi, ID
Spearheaded development of mobile-friendly web applications, improving site performance and accessibility by 85%.
Collaborated with backend developers and UI/UX designers to deliver a redesigned, WordPress-based website, boosting engagement by 15% post-launch.
Led weekly sprints to identify and solve UI bugs, enhancing responsiveness and overall site performance.
IT Support – Volunteer at MEDIA SELARAS, Bogor, ID
Enhanced UI design quality by collaborating across 6 divisions, implementing typography, animations, and interface elements such as buttons and dropdowns using Figma, React, Axios, and Tailwind CSS.
Delivered 5 coding training sessions over a month to help teams better implement UI designs into source code.
Developed a scholarship and internship page, generating 150+ weekly visits, by implementing feedback from cross-functional teams.
UI/UX - Virtual Internship at FUNDEX : PROJECT BASED INTERN : VIRTUAL INTERNSHIP EXPERIENCE
Led the end-to-end redesign of the FundEx website, including user research, wireframes, and usability testing.
Conducted user journey mapping and prototyping, resulting in a 20% improvement in website usability post-redesign (Figma, Miro, & Maze).
Utilized tools like Maze for usability testing and Figma for high-fidelity designs, delivering 5+ iterations for stakeholder approval.
Frontend Web Learning Path at BAPAREKRAF DIGITAL TALENT 2023 – FRONTEND DEVELOPER, Jakarta, ID
Built responsive landing pages using Semantic HTML and CSS Flexbox, increasing user interaction by 30% through optimized design principles.
Designed and implemented clean and accessible codebases, following best practices for frontend development.
